document_data.name: Anwhar Bellgate
document_data.refs35: The rogue level is missing from the source, but was since clarified in a now-unavailable post.
document_data.mainbody: '''Anwhar Bellgate''' was a [[spellthief]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: Besides some skill at stealth, Anwhar Bellgate was a [[spellthief]] of some power. He could also convert stolen spells into other spells, belonging to one of Bhaal's domains.
document_data.Activities: He was a merchant who mostly plied the route between [[Scornubel]] and [[Waterdeep]], but also a highly successful assassin.
document_data.History: During the [[Time of Troubles]] in [[1358 DR]], Anwhar Bellgate came into contact with the godsblood shed between [[Bhaal]] and [[Cyric]], eventually developing his spellthieving abilities. He continued to ply the route, but became an assassin by [[1372 DR]].
